actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Leahy, Committee on the Judiciary, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 45.
name: Sheri Polster Chappell
nominee: Sheri Polster Chappell, of Florida, to be United States District Judge for the Middle District of Florida
position: United States District Judge for the Middle District of Florida
